==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|さい|ご|yomi=on}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|さいご}}

# [[last]], [[end]], [[conclusion]]

====Usage notes====
Not to be confused with "{{ja-r|最期|さいご}}". "{{lang|ja|最'''後'''}}" means "''end of '''something'''''", "{{lang|ja|最'''期'''}}" means "''end of '''life'''''".

====Synonyms====
* {{ja-r|終わり|おわり}}

====Antonyms====
* {{ja-r|最初|さいしょ}}: [[first]]
* {{ja-r|始まり|はじまり}}

====Derived terms====
{{der-top}}
Common
* {{ja-l|最後尾|さいこうび|saikōbi}}: end of a queue
* {{ja-l|最後の最後に|さいごのさいごに|saigo no saigo ni}}: final performance
* {{ja-l|最後の舞台|さいごのぶたい|saigo no butai}}: at the last moment

Uncommon
* {{ja-l|最後発|さいこうはつ|saikō hatsu}}: last entrant
* {{ja-l|最後列|さいこうれつ|saikō retsu}}: last row
** {{ja-l|最後列車|さいごれっしゃ|saigo ressha}}: last train
* {{ja-l|最後通告|さいごつうこく|saigo tsūkoku}}: final warning; ultimatum
* {{ja-l|最後に笑うものが最もよく笑う|さいごにわらうものがもっともよくわらう|saigo ni warau mono ga mottomo yoku warau}}: "He who laughs last laughs hardest"

{{der-mid}}
Uncommon (continued)
* {{ja-l|最後の審判|さいごのしんぱん|saigo no shinpan}}: Final Judgement
* {{ja-l|最後まで|さいごまで|saigo made}}: to the end, to the last

Rare
* {{ja-l|最後っ屁|さいごっぺ|saigoppe}}: fart of desperation
* {{ja-l|最後通牒|さいごつうちょう|saigo tsūchō}}: ultimatum
* {{ja-l|最後の晩餐|さいごばんさん|saigo no bansan}}: the Last Supper
